1111322132411.content:
So, these new experimenters are planning to let an Orca become your new mommy. That was great with you. You always thought Orcas were awesome majestic creatures. You loved them. To become one yourself would be a dream come true.

But are they letting you be mothered by a wild Orca, or an Orca that was bred in captivity like at Sea World?
1111322132411.title: An Orca mother.

choices: Finding a way to reboost wild Orca population.
Extend the life length of wild Orcas. Next step before Human longevity.
It was just a new adoption program. The adoption centers were filling up quick.
11113221324111.content: So, during this whole time, these scientist who had been wanting to do these experiments, had befriended a pod of Orcas. They bared them no ill will, but for some time had been conducting some new experiments prior to your arrival here today. What exactly had these scientists been doing?
11113221324111.title: Wild Orcas are the way to go.

choices: A way to save endangered species from extinction. (Endangered animal unbirth)
A New Way for Collage Girls to experience the joys of pregnancy.
A new way for families to win trips to theme parks.
None of these, even more options.
111132214.content: Okay. So it's not a new form of daycare for either human or animal caretakers. And it's not some new form of adoption for orphaned children. So, is it one of these three following:
111132214.title: Something else.

112.content: Ah of course you're a women silly me. I'll need you're age ma'ma
112.title: Women

1121.content: Exact age miss it's important for the tests.
1121.title: Young

11212.content: Just old enough to start having fun in life right miss? Well that's most of what we need really follow me to your appointment.

112123.content: Stepping into the single elevator behind the recipient desk you wait. Watching as the individual leading you swipes a keycard. A momentary pause before the machine lurches downward toward the laboratory below. "Now then it looks like you're here for some of our more exotic creatures. At least you've been selected to host one of them so we can learn about it." Flipping through her clipboard she nods a few times. "You will be interacting with the ____ it seems to really love occupying empty wombs."
112123.title: Monster unbirth

1121231.content:
"You will be interacting with the slime it seems to really love occupying empty wombs." The receptionist says rapidly tapping on a pass code locked door ahead of you. It slides open with a hiss revealing the long hallway ahead of you. The sound of your steps echo the almost empty space. Small viewing slits in the doors to your left and right reveal brief glimpses of the strange monsters waiting their turn. You stop at door 4F. Sliding the keycard the door clicks the receptionist stepping to the side. "Alright head inside and just relax we will be watching so you don't have anything to worry about.

Nodding you step through the sliding door. Flicking your gaze about you notice a few things. A comfy looking bed sits in one corner. A small desk with a small laptop and tv are the only creature comforts inside the stark white chamber. Blinking you look all around for the creature you are to host and see nothing.
1121231.title: Slime

113.content: The women takes a step back as you enter even the guards gasping at your visage. "I...I didn't think they let you in the front!" the receptionist says in a shaky voice. Your attention is drawn to her or more importantly her empty womb. Do you chose her as you first host? Maybe you do but for now what are you...
113.title: Other? (Monster)

12.content: Sorry they really should have brought YOU through the back entrance come along I'll take down your info.
12.title: Not at all a volunteer (Test Subject)

121.content: You don't really follow along happily. Two large orderlies shoving you ahead as you enter an elevator with the receptionist. "Now then what do we do with you sir hmm..."
121.title: Man

1212.content:
Tapping her pen on the tablet in her hand the women who greeted you grins. "Well we do have an opening in section C here. Now just what animal to pair you with..." Your heart races the sound thumping in your ears. All you did was walk into the wrong door! You thought this was a Starbucks!

Your mind wanders to the many possibilities of what she's mentioned. Animals? What are they going to do to you that involves animals? Lurching to a stop the door ding and slide open. Shoved forward you see a large underground complex ahead of you through a glass window. What direction do the orderlies drag you next?
1212.title: Animal Unbirth

12121.content:
You tire yourself out over the next couple of minutes. The echoing sound of footprints on the concrete floor outpaced by your racing heart. Surprisingly you pass by several people. None of whom even turn their head as you yell for help. What kind of crazy place did you get yourself into?

"Well we actually have a few open land animals at the moment." The receptionist mumbles to herself. "With your body type you would be best for..."

For what?! Why does your body type matter so much you wonder.
12121.title: Land Animals

121211.content:
Eying you carefully the receptionist IF that was what she even was mulled over her options. "Well we have a few horses that are just dying to have full bellies again. They do so hate being without a foal."

Horses? Foals? What in gods name was this crazy women taking about! With the last of your energy you kick and struggle!
121211.title: Equine

1212112.content:
Screaming and hollering for anyone at all to help you thrash in your captors arms. They hold tight grunting with the effort to keep you mostly held still. For all your work you just end up a bit more tired and sweaty.

Tapping her foot the women clicks her tongue and glares at you. "Try to be civil about this alright? We can make the process easy or very difficult it just depends on which of these mares I pick for you. I may as well tell you the options and give you a chance to decide."

Flipping through her tablet she spins it around with a smile. As if explaining a horse to you is just a normal everyday thing here. "This is an Isis, the Arabian, this mare stands at five feet tall at her shoulder and weights roughly one thousand pounds. She has a lovely golden brown coat color and is a normal sized mare. You could fit into her but it wouldn't be to easy."

Staring with mouth agape you hear but fail to understand her meaning. Fit inside of her? What??

Continuing she flips to another horse. "Now this is a big girl for horses. This is Laura the Shire. She stands at an impressive seven feet and a few inches at her shoulder and weights three thousand pounds! I just love her dark black coat and white highlights on her hooves and nose. She can easily fit you inside of her. Maybe you've been to bad to get such an easy go of it."
1212112.title: Only end up more tired.

121213.content: A few more choices to drive the narrative
121213.title: Other

122.content: You don't really follow along happily. Two large orderlies shoving you ahead as you enter an elevator with the receptionist. "Now then what do we do with you Ma'ma hmm..."
122.title: Women

1223.content:
You struggle as the elevator lurches downward. The two burly orderlies holding onto you easily enough. Meanwhile the receptionist takes rapid notes about you. "Now then you seem very fit. A slim belly wide hips an ample enough bust but that's not very important." she says with a wink. "The hips are going to do you well I think It's so much harder on the poor girls with thin waists the beasts have such a hard time getting past those..."

Shivering at her calm words you glare back at her. How could she be so easily amused by this? These people were about to do...somthing to you!"

Do you wish to continue as this 'volunteer' or swap to another already ready and waiting in the facility,
1223.title: Monster Unbirth

12231.content:
Even as your trying to comprehend the horror of all this the elevator dings doors sliding open into a long hallway. Bright lights make the white walls and tile floors seem to almost glow. Making you squint as you're lead forward. Sounds reach your ears from the many rooms you pass. Moans and sobs of other 'volunteers' both men and women.

Glancing over you notice a strange blob climbing on top of a women younger then even you. Her arms restrained at her sides while her legs are held up and open for the creature. You're moved forward before seeing more.

Your attention is drawn away by a snapping of fingers near your face. "Pay attention!" the receptionist barks at you with a huff. "It won't do if your not even listening. Now then, we will be 'generous' and give you the option of picking what you will...host" she finishes with a smirk. Leading you into a room filled with three storage tanks each labeled....
12231.title: Continue as this character.

122312.content:
Pushed forward you lean cautiously toward the first tanks window. A sudden lurch of movement makes you stumble back with a scream of surprise. A vile looking black worm creature presses against the glass leaving a gooey residue behind as it slides away.

Gulping you move to the next tank water inside bubbles rapidly. Peering in you see a swarm of what looks to be fist sized....sperm? Squinting you watch the odd things float lazily they don't seem to dangerous. Before you can really get a good look at them the receptionist shoves you toward the next tank. "Hurry and make a choice!" she barks again in her angry voice.

Scowling back at her for a moment you turn to the last tank. Bile rising in your throat you watch as skeletal creature stares back at you. It doesn't even look human it's body twisted and broken looking. Yet it's dark coal colored eyes follow your every movement.
122312.title: Continue as this character.

choices: You enter the pool out of fear what they might do otherwise.
You try the door maybe it's not locked well?
Your rage gives you the idea to drag the receptionist in with you!
1223122.content:
You point toward the middle tank finger shaking as you make the decision. The bulbous head of a sperm like creature bumps against the glass wiggling as if it's trying to reach your finger. You try to take a step back but the guard behind you clasps a hand over your shoulder keeping you from fleeing. "Alright it's specimen X12 then." the receptionist says while scribbling on her clipboard. Tapping a command console next to the tanks the middle one lifts up into the air and off through a conveyor belt system further down the hallway.

Rapidly your lead down into another room where a small pool waits your ordered to strip until naked which you uneasily do. The guard surprisingly leaves the door making a loud locking sound as a bar slams down from the other side to keep you and the receptionist in the room. It seems she is their to make sure you climb into the water.

From above the tank lowers into the pool the water growing turbulent as it hisses open the swarm of sperm creatures moving to explore their new area for hosts. The women glares at you as if expecting you to just march into the pool. You glare right back daring her to make you try as the now empty tank is lifted out of the pool. "Well? Get in their test subject I don't have all day."
1223122.title: A tank of sperm?

choices: Pushing the limits of human reproduction!
Poking that neat alien that just came in the other day.
You're not sure, why not ask your boss?
13.content: You buzz yourself in past the receptionist with a wave. It's nothing new for you as you head down to the near basement level of the compound. Just what sort of mad science have you been tasked with overseeing on your shift today?
13.title: Here to work actually (Scientist)

choices: Lets start off sending a mouse back a week.
Lets send a human back in time from inside an animal.
Why not send yourself back? After all you're smart enough to get back right?
131.content:
Whistling you head to your lab and prepare your next round of crazy gov't funded experimentation. On the board today is an odd one but it has some promise. After a few to many long nights in the lab a college and yourself came up with a unique idea. What if time travel could be possible through some form of unbirth transference?

The general train of thought is this. Inserting a living creature into the womb of a living female might present you with an option. Using some alien tech you might have stolen from sector-8 you are sure pulsing the right energy into the female will send the creature inside her womb back in time. Following her line of parentage back to the past. The test subject hopefully popping back into reality safe and sound wherever the ancestor happens to be.

The problem now was how to even test this. Human subjects were available and willing to have animals inserted into them but how would you know your idea worked? No sane women will admit she sudden birthed a lab mouse 200 years ago.

That gives you a second option. Taking another test subject and inserting them into a large enough animal. Then sending them back a few years to see if they pop back into reality. Maybe even a few years earlier into the same host females body.

Your not quite sure how to get them back. Perhaps sending them with a portable device that they can active. Of course they will first have to be birthed so they can see how far back they went. Then reenter the same female to ensure they travel back forward up the ancestral chain.

Well, what should we test first on this crazy idea?
131.title: Time travel through unbirth.

14.content: An animal just wandering in off the street? This is one strange town but not the oddest thing going on in this building. How does the receptionist react to your arrival?
14.title: An animal? Why didn't they bring you to the...

choices: Awaken with a test subject in your room.
144.content: The well dressed women sighs only giving you a half glance as she rapidly taps on her computer. "They know to deliver these things in the loading dock..." she grumbles." A few moments later a man and a women enter the lobby from a side door. Before you can react a dart impacts against your chest and the world goes dark.
144.title: Annoyance

choices: The door at the end of the corridor.
The door you hear crying behind.
The door that stinks of decay.
The door you just came from.
15.content:
This building was supposedly owned by a secret organization that does all sorts of evil experiments on people. When the organization first started their experiments, rumors say that a lot of people died but now that they've perfected their methods there have been no more fatalities but that doesn't excuse them of the dastardly crimes they've committed and that's why you're here now.

You burst in through the door of the building and start clearing the building room by room with your fellow agents with you, to your surprise you haven't encountered any resistance thus far but just as you were thinking that you had been given the wrong information you hear something behind you.

You instinctually turned around with your weapon raised and so did the other agents with you but you saw nothing out of the ordinary "what was that?" a female agent by the name of Ellie Davis inquired "probably just the wi..." but before you could finish your sentence you had fallen to the ground... no, you hadn't fallen, something had grabbed your ankle and was dragging you away from the others! "What is that?" you hear Agent Davis shout from further away than she should have been but you couldn't respond as unnatural exhaustion was taking over your body and you could no longer stay conscious.

When you came to, you found yourself in a dimly lit concrete room with a solid iron door as your only hope of escape. To your surprise, the door opened when you pushed and as you stepped out you found yourself in a long corridor similar to the room you were just in though elongated and with more doors. There were 5 iron doors, one at the end of the corridor, one that is rusted, one that you can hear crying behind, one that stinks of decay and the door that leads to the room you just came from.

Which door should you choose?
15.title: Gov't agent this is a raid!

info.brief_description: You're either a volunteer or taken for some mad reproduction experiments.Vore or be vored!
info.description:
Hello traveler and welcome to this imaginative story. If you’re here you were probably looking for a unique type of content. This interactive story will revolve around the unbirth of individuals. The trees will start with the options for either a human x human, animal x human, or human x monster. With options for either party to be the one getting a new creature inside of them.

I’m going to play off also adding a willing x unwilling option for the female. As this is a very extreme topic most often the female would be VERY against it realistically. Of course this can be spun on it’s head and the female in the scene can be eager to accept whatever is attempting entry back into the womb. If your playing a male getting vored they might not want to be this volunteer either!

A few things that I won’t allow in this story. SCAT, DEATH, BURSTING, GORE MALE MPREG. This is just for vaginal unbirth back into the womb. As a side note rapid pregnancy will be allowed as well.

Other then that feel free to post your own entries. I will try to moderate them to the best of my ability so low effort content will be removed or edited if it has some potential.
